{
  "name": "docs-site",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "next dev -p 3001",
    "predev": "pnpm run generate-search-index && pnpm run generate-agent-json",
    "build": "next build",
    "prebuild": "pnpm run generate-search-index && pnpm run generate-agent-json",
    "package": "mkdir -p ../../artifacts && tar -czf ../../artifacts/docs-site.tar.gz -C out .",
    "deploy": "pnpm run build && pnpm run package",
    "start": "next start -p 3001",
    "lint": "pnpm run lint:eslint && pnpm run lint:markdown",
    "lint:eslint": "next lint",
    "lint:markdown": "remark \"../../docs/**/*.md\" \"src/**/*.mdx\" --config ./remark.config.mjs --frail",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit",
    "generate-search-index": "node scripts/generate-search-index.js",
    "generate-agent-json": "node scripts/generate-agent-json.js",
    "generate-repo-index": "node scripts/generate-repo-index.mjs",
    "generate-repo-files": "node scripts/generate-repo-files.mjs",
    "validate-docs": "node ./scripts/validate-docs.mjs",
    "validate:metadata": "node scripts/validate-metadata.mjs",
    "check:links": "node scripts/check-links.mjs",
    "validate:endpoints": "node scripts/docs-smoke-test.mjs",
    "check:freshness": "node scripts/check-freshness.mjs",
    "validate:api-sync": "node scripts/validate-api-sync.mjs",
    "validate:api-sync:strict": "node scripts/validate-api-sync.mjs --strict",
    "validate:all": "pnpm run validate:metadata && pnpm run check:links && pnpm run check:freshness && pnpm run validate:api-sync",
    "sync:openapi": "node scripts/sync-openapi.mjs",
    "sync:openapi:update": "node scripts/sync-openapi.mjs --update",
    "generate:api-reference": "node ./scripts/generate-api-reference.mjs",
    "generate:api-types": "node scripts/generate-api-types.mjs",
    "generate:component-docs": "node scripts/extract-component-docs.mjs",
    "generate:all": "pnpm run generate:api-reference && pnpm run generate:api-types && pnpm run generate:component-docs && pnpm run generate-search-index && pnpm run generate-agent-json",
    "generate:api-docs": "cd ../../services/api-gateway && python3 tools/generate_api_docs.py --format all"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "fuse.js": "^6.6.2",
    "gray-matter": "^4.0.3",
    "i18next": "^25.6.3",
    "i18next-browser-languagedetector": "^8.2.0",
    "mermaid": "^10.9.1",
    "next": "^14.2.0",
    "next-mdx-remote": "^5.0.0",
    "prism-react-renderer": "^2.3.1",
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "react-i18next": "^16.3.5",
    "react-markdown": "^9.0.0",
    "react-syntax-highlighter": "^16.1.0",
    "rehype-autolink-headings": "^7.1.0",
    "rehype-pretty-code": "^0.14.0",
    "rehype-slug": "^6.0.0",
    "remark-gfm": "^4.0.0",
    "shiki": "^1.23.0",
    "unist-util-visit": "^5.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@tailwindcss/typography": "^0.5.10",
    "@types/node": "^20.11.5",
    "@types/react": "^18.2.48",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.2.18",
    "@types/react-syntax-highlighter": "^15.5.13",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.17",
    "eslint": "^8.56.0",
    "eslint-config-next": "^14.2.0",
    "glob": "^10.3.0",
    "openapi-typescript": "^6.7.0",
    "postcss": "^8.4.33",
    "react-docgen-typescript": "^2.2.2",
    "remark-cli": "^12.0.1",
    "remark-frontmatter": "^5.0.0",
    "remark-mdx": "^3.1.0",
    "remark-preset-lint-recommended": "^7.0.1",
    "remark-validate-links": "^13.0.1",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.1",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3"
  }
}
